foods.name: អាម៉ុកត្រី
foods.description: A traditional Khmer dish made with fish, coconut milk, and a blend of spices, steamed in banana leaves. It's creamy, aromatic, and mildly spicy, offering a unique taste of Cambodian cuisine.

foods.name: បាយសាច់ជ្រូក
foods.description: A popular breakfast dish in Cambodia, featuring grilled pork served with broken rice, often accompanied by pickled vegetables and a light broth.

foods.name: នំបញ្ចុក
foods.description: A traditional Khmer noodle soup with rice noodles, green curry, fish, and fresh herbs. Known as 'Khmer noodles,' it is commonly enjoyed as a breakfast dish.

foods.name: ឡុកឡាក់
foods.description: Tender stir-fried beef served on a bed of lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers, typically accompanied by a pepper-lime dipping sauce.

foods.name: សម្លកកូរ
foods.description: A hearty vegetable stew featuring fish, banana flowers, and a variety of green vegetables, seasoned with prahok (fermented fish paste) for an authentic Khmer flavor.
